name.str_sp: If you're reading this I didn't name the artifact

description: An artifact is a strange misshapen object that is colored randomly and glows a random color that may also be different. It exhibits immensely powerful properties on the wearer and surroundings. No two artifacts ever look alike, even among the same classification. If you're reading this I didn't describe the artifact.

An artifact is a strange misshapen object that is colored randomly and glows a random color that may also be different. It exhibits immensely powerful properties on the wearer and surroundings. No two artifacts ever look alike, even among the same classification. It flickers and struggles to stay in your world, by exposing it to an element like fire or electrical charge you could create any strong artifact of your choosing.

An artifact is a strange misshapen object that is colored randomly and glows a random color that may also be different. It exhibits immensely powerful properties on the wearer and surroundings. No two artifacts ever look alike, even among the same classification. It seems cold to the touch, and refrigerates the air around you. It also feels damp, you could capture water vapor with this.

An artifact is a strange misshapen object that is colored randomly and glows a random color that may also be different. It exhibits immensely powerful properties on the wearer and surroundings. No two artifacts ever look alike, even among the same classification. It is very cold to the touch, and freezes the air around you. It also feels damp, you could capture water vapor with this. It protects well against heat and lasers.

An artifact is a strange misshapen object that is colored randomly and glows a random color that may also be different. It exhibits immensely powerful properties on the wearer and surroundings. No two artifacts ever look alike, even among the same classification. You can barely hold this without gloves, it will stop almost all incoming heat damage and lasers.

An artifact is a strange misshapen object that is colored randomly and glows a random color that may also be different. It exhibits immensely powerful properties on the wearer and surroundings. No two artifacts ever look alike, even among the same classification. It warms your hands a little and can cook food.

An artifact is a strange misshapen object that is colored randomly and glows a random color that may also be different. It exhibits immensely powerful properties on the wearer and surroundings. No two artifacts ever look alike, even among the same classification. It's too hot to hold without gloves and it can cook food for you. It will keep you safe from liquid nitrogen and cold spells.

An artifact is a strange misshapen object that is colored randomly and glows a random color that may also be different. It exhibits immensely powerful properties on the wearer and surroundings. No two artifacts ever look alike, even among the same classification. You're lucky it doesn't set you on fire, it will protect you from almost all incoming cold damage.

An artifact is a strange misshapen object that is colored randomly and glows a random color that may also be different. It exhibits immensely powerful properties on the wearer and surroundings. No two artifacts ever look alike, even among the same classification. You can rip raw electricity out of it to place into electrical devices.

An artifact is a strange misshapen object that is colored randomly and glows a random color that may also be different. It exhibits immensely powerful properties on the wearer and surroundings. No two artifacts ever look alike, even among the same classification. You can rip raw electricity out of it to place into electrical devices, it will absorb lots of incoming electric damage and can act as a generator.

An artifact is a strange misshapen object that is colored randomly and glows a random color that may also be different. It exhibits immensely powerful properties on the wearer and surroundings. No two artifacts ever look alike, even among the same classification.  You can rip raw electricity out of it to place into electrical devices, it provides electrical immunity and can power an entire base.

An artifact is a strange misshapen object that is colored randomly and glows a random color that may also be different. It exhibits immensely powerful properties on the wearer and surroundings. No two artifacts ever look alike, even among the same classification. It tingles when you hold it. It can block some acid damage, you can extract weak acids rarely.

An artifact is a strange misshapen object that is colored randomly and glows a random color that may also be different. It exhibits immensely powerful properties on the wearer and surroundings. No two artifacts ever look alike, even among the same classification. It burns your skin if you hold it without gloves. It can block a lot of acid damage and creates quite a bit of various acids.

An artifact is a strange misshapen object that is colored randomly and glows a random color that may also be different. It exhibits immensely powerful properties on the wearer and surroundings. No two artifacts ever look alike, even among the same classification. Your hands melt if you hold it without gloves. It can block almost all acid damage and is a great source of any acid.

An artifact is a strange misshapen object that is colored randomly and glows a random color that may also be different. It exhibits immensely powerful properties on the wearer and surroundings. No two artifacts ever look alike, even among the same classification. You feel a little lighter from wearing it. If you understood magic you could make ballistic protection armor.

An artifact is a strange misshapen object that is colored randomly and glows a random color that may also be different. It exhibits immensely powerful properties on the wearer and surroundings. No two artifacts ever look alike, even among the same classification. You feel a lot lighter from wearing it. If you understood magic you could make ballistic protection armor.

An artifact is a strange misshapen object that is colored randomly and glows a random color that may also be different. It exhibits immensely powerful properties on the wearer and surroundings. No two artifacts ever look alike, even among the same classification. You feel the burdens of gravity disappear. If you understood magic you could make ballistic protection armor.
An artifact battery cell equivalent to a small battery. Recharges at 4 units per hour, but you get 5 from crafting.
An artifact battery cell equivalent to a medium battery. Recharges at 20 units per hour.
An artifact battery cell equivalent to a heavy battery. Recharges at 40 units per hour, but it costs two artifacts.
You've studied this artifact and wrote your findings on paper, you feel a greater understanding of magic. Use all 4 studies to become an Apostle.
You've studied this artifact and wrote your findings on paper, you feel a greater understanding of magic. Use all 4 studies to become an Apostle.
You've studied this artifact and wrote your findings on paper, you feel a greater understanding of magic. Use all 4 studies to become an Apostle.
You've studied this artifact and wrote your findings on paper, you feel a greater understanding of magic. Use all 4 studies to become an Apostle.
Combining a cold and heat artifact with string and carrying it at your side lets you be protected from temperature. Disassemble to get the artifacts back.

name: artifact oven
description: You modified the oven with a heat artifact, it can cook forever if you place it on the ground.

name: artifact freezer
description: You modified the freezer with a cold artifact, keeping its contents frozen indefinitely.

name: artifact refrigerator
description: You modified this refrigerator with a weak cold artifact, keeping its contents cool indefinitely.

name: artifact stabilizer system
description: This sophisticated and expensive machine lets you manipulate artifact properties and convert them into higher tiers. It can blast artifacts with powerful magnetic fields, freeze or heat them to incredible temperatures, and pour megawatts of power into them. It can only be placed on a grid.

name: artifact soldering iron
description: This heat artifact had a nail carefully driven into it with a rag as a handle, it warms the nail to soldering temperatures when held.

name: artifact welder
description: This heat artifact had a pipe drilled into it and is capable of igniting the oxygen in a controlled enough fashion to perfectly mimic oxyacetylene, once again proving these artifacts may understand what you want out of them.
This 60 liter tank has an artifact attached to the side with plastic, prevents food stored inside it from ever spoiling.
